ORDINANCE COMMITTEE
COMMITTTEE MEETING
~ MINUTES ~
Wednesday, April 6, 2022

5:30 PM

Sullivan Chamber

The Ordinance Committee will meet to conduct a public hearing on a petition to amend the zoning
ordinance entitled “Article 22 Sustainable Design and Development” (Ordinance #2022-7).
Attendee Name

Amendment to Article 22 of the Zoning Ordinance of the City of Cambridge entitled
“SUSTAINABLE DESIGN AND DEVELOPMENT” to insert a new section.
